TextView.android:text:
Deshatan is an AR-based Multiplayer Mobile game that brings a new modernized approach to Tourism using Augmented Reality. 

Follow the steps to start playing

1) Register yourself in the game
2) Create/Join a room and share room link with your friends
3) When in a room, you can see an AR board with all the places available in the game
4) Now, roll the dice and the corresponding Place would be shown in AR using a Virtual Train.
5) Visit and roam around in that place using an Anywhere door entrance to the place.

[ When you land on an unowned property you can buy that property from the Bank at its printed price. ]

6) Finally, Buy and receive a Ticket for that place corresponding to a particular color.

[ Every time any user visits a bought Place, he/she has to pay the rent to its Owner. The rent will double if the owner owns more than 3 places of similar color. ]

If a player runs out of Money, The is a facility of Bank in the Game. The player can either be granted a loan or can mortgage his property to the bank.

You are declared bankrupt if you owe more than you can pay to another player or the Bank.

Bank: The Bank pays salaries and bonuses. The Bank collects all taxes, fines, loans and interest, and the price of all properties which it sells and auctions.

Quiz: Answer the questions correctly to receive monetary bonus.
